outline:
1. to be or grow wide, be or grow large
    1. (Qal) to be widened, be enlarged
    2. (Niphal) broad or roomy pasture (participle)
    3. (Hiphil)
      1. to make large
      2. to enlarge
kjv_def: be an en-(make) large(-ing), make room, make (open) wide.
strongs_def: to broaden (intransitive or transitive, literal or figurative)
